title: Ribbon Samples, 1860–1870
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: taffeta, satin weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: Two pieces of ribbon with a patterned satin border. The first is ombré pale blue with a white border. The second is ombré pale purple with a green and white border.

tombstone.epitaph:
